comments.html:
Junos 14.1x53 for EX and QFX has just bean released

https://www.juniper.net/techpubs/en_US/junos14.1/information-products/topic-collections/ex-qfx-series/release-notes/ex-qfx-series-junos-release-notes-14.1X53-D10.pdf

On the QFX5100 It include:
vxlan and ovsdb support (Only L2 as it is based on T2)
openflow support (include 1.3.1 ) but with very limited actions
Keep hashing on LAG/ECMP when a link failed/add
EoMPLS
